column5: HelloLooking to build a porch on LOTW. Can someone tell me the name and phone number of the lumber yard up in Nestor Falls. Or even the bait shop up there, they would be able to get the number. Thanks folks.Lane
I think NF has a website, if not try Kenora and drill down to your area. There are listings of all kinds of local businesses.
There are at least 2 bait shops in Nestor Falls. I've used the one by Dalseg's for a couple of years now. Their number (last year) is 807-484-2525. Good luck with the project. Terry
Heres a link that may help you out.http://www.lakeofthewoodsvacations.com/services.htmD'arcy
Now that Nestor is a town ship make sure you get permission from the twon to build!!

Hi there,Before you begin the construction of your dock you probably want to consult with the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources as you may require a permit to work around water. The minor paperwork or approval needed is a lot easier than a visit from a Conservation Officer.
Falls Hardware is in Nestor Falls. Their number is 807-484-2454 or email [email protected]. Check out www.sunsetcountry.net for to search for Bait & Tackle shops.
I reference www.kenoraontario.net and www.justfishontario.com. Drill down in each respective site until you find the area you are looking for.
